attributes.action: Give Doctors and Nurses FREE Parking forever
attributes.additional_details: My daughter is a nurse who worked on the Covid-19 ward in Pinderfields, Wakefield and I saw how much this pandemic affected her. The doctors and nurses work so hard without any reward and thanks so i would like you to remove parking fees forever. I saw my daughter come home exhausted many times. You are supporting businesses why not support humanity and look after those that look after YOU prime minister
attributes.background: Bring in a new law so that its illegal to charge any parking fees for any doctor or nurse working at any hospital in the uk, also make it illegal for them to add the charges elsewhere

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Forever Free Parking for NHS and Care Workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313385
